Personally I think dead man's plate or anything  juggeranuts usually buy that gives movement speed should be reworked. Honestly Juggeranuts shouldn't have mobility or much of it. That's the point of juggernauts of course. That aside, I will say that Darius was the best juggernaut rework of the 3 juggernauts. He doesn't have any gap closers in his kit so he pretty much has to walk up to everyone to get going but he now does a crap lot of damage even when building tank. In other words, you completely ignored him throughout the fight. The reason why he was reworked was specifically to make it so you can't do that anymore, or else he'll ramp up into carry mode now.
So now we have to focus the tank and leave the backline alone?

No, what you have to do is not disregard him entirely and give him free reign to just do whatever he wants. Darius (and Garen/Skarner/Morde) now fall into the same category as Nasus. Most tanks do their job by being CC machines. Since none of those champs can be a CC machine, they have to be a threat to do their job. This means if they get to you and stick to you for a while, you WILL die. You either CC them or you kite them, since they need a few moments to get going and they can't ramp up their damage if they can't get into melee range. And if you can't do either of those things, then yes, you have to focus them while lamenting the fact that your team comp is kind of awful.
